verses.verse: Thus all <WH3605> the work <WH4399> that <WH834> Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> for the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> was finished: <WH7999> and Solomon <WH8010> brought in <WH935> <WH853> all the things <WH6944> that David <WH1732> his father <WH1> had dedicated; <WH6944> and the silver, <WH3701> and the gold, <WH2091> and all <WH3605> the instruments, <WH3627> put <WH5414> he among the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430>

Then <WH227> Solomon <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> <WH853> the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> and all <WH3605> the heads <WH7218> of the tribes, <WH4294> the chief <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> unto <WH413> Jerusalem, <WH3389> to bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> out of the city <WH4480> <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> which <WH1931> is Zion. <WH6726>
Wherefore all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> assembled themselves <WH6950> unto <WH413> the king <WH4428> in the feast <WH2282> which <WH1931> was in the seventh <WH7637> month. <WH2320>
And all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came; <WH935> and the Levites <WH3881> took up <WH5375> <WH853> the ark. <WH727>

And they brought up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark, <WH727> and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and all <WH3605> the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that <WH834> were in the tabernacle, <WH168> these did the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> bring up. <WH5927>

Also king <WH4428> Solomon, <WH8010> and all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> that were assembled <WH3259> unto <WH5921> him before <WH6440> the ark, <WH727> sacrificed <WH2076> sheep <WH6629> and oxen, <WH1241> which <WH834> could not <WH3808> be told <WH5608> nor <WH3808> numbered <WH4487> for multitude. <WH4480> <WH7230>

And the priests <WH3548> brought in <WH935> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> his place, <WH4725> to <WH413> the oracle <WH1687> of the house, <WH1004> into <WH413> the most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> place, even under <WH413> <WH8478> the wings <WH3671> of the cherubims: <WH3742>

For the cherubims <WH3742> spread forth <WH1961> <WH6566> their wings <WH3671> over <WH5921> the place <WH4725> of the ark, <WH727> and the cherubims <WH3742> covered <WH3680> <WH5921> the ark <WH727> and the staves <WH905> thereof above. <WH4480> <WH4605>

And they drew out <WH748> the staves <WH905> of the ark, that the ends <WH7218> of the staves <WH905> were seen <WH7200> from <WH4480> the ark <WH727> before <WH5921> <WH6440> the oracle; <WH1687> but they were not <WH3808> seen <WH7200> without. <WH2351> And there <WH8033> it is <WH1961> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

There was nothing <WH369> in the ark <WH727> save <WH7535> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> put <WH5414> therein at Horeb, <WH2722> when <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH3772> a covenant with <WH5973> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> when they came out <WH3318> of Egypt. <WH4480> <WH4714>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when the priests <WH3548> were come out <WH3318> of <WH4480> the holy <WH6944> place: (for <WH3588> all <WH3605> the priests <WH3548> that were present <WH4672> were sanctified, <WH6942> and did not <WH369> then wait <WH8104> by course: <WH4256>

Also the Levites <WH3881> which were the singers, <WH7891> all <WH3605> of them of Asaph, <WH623> of Heman, <WH1968> of Jeduthun, <WH3038> with their sons <WH1121> and their brethren, <WH251> being arrayed <WH3847> in white linen, <WH948> having cymbals <WH4700> and psalteries <WH5035> and harps, <WH3658> stood <WH5975> at the east end <WH4217> of the altar, <WH4196> and with <WH5973> them a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> priests <WH3548> sounding <WH2690> with trumpets: ) <WH2689>

It came even to pass, <WH1961> as the trumpeters <WH2690> and singers <WH7891> were as one, <WH259> to make one <WH259> sound <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> in praising <WH1984> and thanking <WH3034> the LORD; <WH3068> and when they lifted up <WH7311> their voice <WH6963> with the trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> and instruments <WH3627> of music, <WH7892> and praised <WH1984> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, For <WH3588> he is good; <WH2896> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever: <WH5769> that then the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with a cloud, <WH6051> even the house <WH1004> of the LORD; <WH3068>

So that the priests <WH3548> could <WH3201> not <WH3808> stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> by reason of <WH4480> <WH6440> the cloud: <WH6051> for <WH3588> the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> had filled <WH4390> <WH853> the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430>
